text:
I am new in HubSpot and learning how to edit files.
Is there anyone who can help me how to edit search file module or create child theme so I can test my JS code.
Right now I opened the parent theme and it said you can't edit this file.
You need to create a child theme and then customize module or file as per needs
Okay, how I can create from here?

one question about contact import

I am importing contacts with having their company domain property, I want to associate this record with the company which is already exist in system during imports. is this possible?\

I started having issues with updating custom object via api, it was working but I started getting  an error requiredScopes: "crm.objects.custom.write" but that scope is selected in the private app that we use. Any ideas why this is happening?

<@UNWHHSWHJ> Yes this is possible. If the company already exists in HubSpot the contacts will automatically associate with that company if they have the same company domain name. If you have multiple companies with the same domain you can import using Record ID instead of company domain name. First find the record ID from the company in HubSpot then import the contacts mapping to the record ID instead of company domain name <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/import-and-export/import-objects>

<@UNWHHSWHJ>, I used different approaches for that. One of them is to export the companies, and then align them in Google Sheets with a VLOOKUP and then attaching the ID to the Contact record and importing. Then you have the full control what you’re importing and how you associate. But there are other techniques as well.

Hi <@UNWHHSWHJ>,

I hope you are well today.

As an additional consideration, it may be worth doing some form of lookup for an email domain string or set of domains to then attach the ID of the contact record. This can help if you have multiple nested companies and don't want to go through setting them all up separately or in clusters.

Little bit of extra work at the beginning but certainly helpful if you're dealing with larger enterprise and investment type firms that have a couple dozen mini-me companies! :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks for suggestions guys. good to know many ways and it's helpful :)

Hi everyone!

We are looking for the solution in order to connect <http://Authorize.net|Authorize.net> and HubSpot. Makewebbetter module functionality is not enough. We need to collect payments (one-time, recurring charges), track payment status, re-run charges manually, track  and manage subscription status. Does someone know any solutions?

Thanks in advance!

Hey Alex, DepositFix supports <http://Authorize.net|Authorize.net> and one-time/subscriptions/payment plans: <https://www.depositfix.com/payment-gateways/authorizenet> I’m the founder, will be happy to show you around.

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
